publ: by 深圳市智云看家科技有限公司
name: Safeview
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Safeview skill can only be used with certain Wi Fi cameras. Not all cameras using the Safeview app can use Safeview skill. Please consult the seller before using this skill to see if your product supports Alexa.
To start, follow these steps:
1. Install the Safeview application from the App Store and Google Play, connect the camera to the Safeview app, and keep it online and running.
2. Find Safeview Skill in the Alexa application, click 'Enable Skills' to link your camera to your Alexa account, and then locate your camera.
3. Try voice commands like 'Alexa, Show Living Room' to obtain real-time videos and monitor everything in your home.
